programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Arabia: Land of Illusions
programme.desc: The Arabian peninsula is an ancient land of illusion. Extreme heat seems to sap life out of every corner. Yet, tricks of the light and the art of deception make survival possible. Nothing is as it seems.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Amazon: One Jungle, Many Worlds
programme.desc: The Amazon is the largest rainforest in the world, and the richest ecosystem on earth. This film uncovers what makes the Amazon such a powerhouse of evolution; how it has come to home a third of all species on the planet.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Galapagos: Darwin's Eden

programme.title: Wildest Arctic: Arctic Ocean: The Frozen Sea

programme.title: Deadly Women: Sacrifice Their Blood

programme.title: Deadly Women: Lethal Love

programme.title: Deadly Women: To Love and to Murder

programme.title: The FBI Files

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Business

programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost for Words
programme.desc: Spirited teenager Jayne Furlong dreamed of becoming a child psychologist - instead, she ended up a prostitute. In 1993, 17 year old Jayne vanished from her patch on Auckland's Karangahape Road.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Wanda Beach Murders / The Beaumont Children Mystery
programme.desc: In 1965, when Australian teenage culture was centred on sun, sand, and surf, the nation was shocked by the brutal bashing, rape and murder of two 15-year-old girls in the sand hills at Sydney's Wanda Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killing Fields of Truro
programme.desc: For the 2008 launch of Crime Investigation Australia, CI presents the complete and compelling story of "The Killing Fields of Truro", one of the most infamous crimes in Australia and yet another set in Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke
programme.desc: In 1959, the carefree culture of Perth changed forever when a plague of crime hit the city. By early 1963, the crime wave had escalated to serial murder.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Bridle Waltz
programme.desc: Harry guilt-trips Becky into telling Claire that Peter is married. Liz tries to reconcile Harry and the boys. Tess decides to leave Drovers Run and work in the café with Simon and Briny.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: To Have And To Hold
programme.desc: Claire's relationships are fragmented - she and Becky are barely speaking, and Tess is now living in Melbourne, unaware of recent events.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Home is Where the Heart is
programme.desc: Claire is taking the loss of both Peter and Tess badly. Unable to raise energy or enthusiasm for anything, including the imminent birth of Blaze's foal, she nonetheless refuses to accept she is suffering from emotional stress.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Wildfire
programme.desc: Becky's brother Mark reappears, determined to drag Sean away from his wholesome life at Killarney. Mark knocks Nick out and coerces Sean into helping steal the Ryans' prize stallion, Wildfire.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Hounded
programme.desc: Frank Da Costa, the new cop in town, has it in for Terry. When Terry unwittingly sells a pair of stolen Alpacas to Tess, he sets up an explosive confrontation that will unearth the dark secret at the heart of Frank's animosity.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Steer Trek
programme.desc: With the drought continuing, and no money to buy feed or truck in water, Claire, Tess, and Nick join forces. Like the Drovers of old, they take their amalgamated herds out on the Gungellan track.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secret Places
programme.desc: When Leland learns that one of his clients with a reputation for stealing has lost her co-signer and could be ready to run, Dog and the crew hop a plane to the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Dog's target today seems to have a taste for drugs and a record of reckless driving. The hunt has deep emotional resonance for the team because today is the anniversary of the fatal car accident of Dog's daughter Barbara Katie.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Colony 100 – Ukraine’s prison for hardened criminals is marked by an omnipresent hopelessness.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: South Cotabato Jail is one of the most overcrowded prisons in the world. There is no hope of improvement.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: The inmates in the Carcel Distrital in Colombia fight many battles: against other prisoners, against the guards and most of all against themselves. It's a battle that most of them lose.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: The Carcel Distrital is located in one of the most dangerous quarters of Bogotá. Nearly 950 men and 50 women are imprisoned here.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: El Hongo is a high-security bunker in Mexico´s desert. With sensors, cameras, mobile phone jammers, this prison is a veritable high-tech fortress.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Once, inmates in Armenian prisons fell into the hands of the "Thieves in Law," a criminal brotherhood rejecting state authority and living by its own code.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Girl Summer
programme.desc: Shortly after tying the knot Diana gave Robert an ultimatum: they'd either have an open relationship or she was gone. He wants to save the marriage, but she isn't ready to compromise. Can Diana finally settle with one man, or is this really the end?

programme.title: Divorce Court: I Scream U Scream
programme.desc: Sharee moved in with Brandon shortly after they met, had a child and still no marriage. Brandon wants her to get a full-time job and not work part-time in their business before they get married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tricks and Treats
programme.desc: First, a mischievous magician gets Ronnie and Carlos to stick together when they interrupt his show to grab his car. Next, Froy and Ronnie have to put their hands on a seriously stupid sugar daddy and the recently upgraded debtor's chest.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Now Serving Mrs. Pizarro
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy discuss what they will do with their severance pay once the company is sold, but have to put the discussion on hold while they repo a hovercraft golf cart from a snooty golfer.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: A professional stunt driver slips through Froy and Sonia's grasp, sending them on a violent high-speed chase. Matt offends a pretty RO who seeks womanly revenge, and Froy and Carlos go undercover at a lowrider show.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Finale
programme.desc: On this special one-hour series finale of Operation Repo, the team is scrambling to get ready for the huge Yacht repo to secure the sale of the company and the distribution of their severance packages, while still going after everyday repos.

programme.title: Operation Repo: It Ain't No Joke!
programme.desc: In this kick-off to the final season, the cast takes viewers back through the most outrageous, comical, and memorable repos of the series. And, get a sneak peek of the final season of Operation Repo.

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Are Operation Repo
programme.desc: After we meet the team members of Operation Repo, Matt, Lou, and Froy get interrupted by a bike riding gangster while trying to hook up a car. And later, Matt, Sonia, and Froy deal with an ecstatic and energetic young debtor who will not let go of her car

programme.title: Operation Repo: Don't You Dare Lift-off
programme.desc: First, Froy, Matt, and Lou turn tail and bail when bats and guns are swung towards them. Later, things get heated for Matt and Sonia just before they head out with Esteban and Lou to ambush a helicopter pilot.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Collectibles
programme.desc: First, Lou, Lyndah, and Matt head to a cul-de-sac to gain possession of a speedboat, and a truck, and a trailer. Later, a rare collectible motorcycle is up for repo, and Matt, Lou, and Froy are ready to collect it. And finally, Froy, Sonia, and Lou nab a.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Adult Film Star
programme.desc: First, Lou, Froy, and Matt press charges after a violent debtor attacks the crew. Later, Lou, Sonia, and Froy head out to the boondocks to repo a BMW in the middle of an adult film shoot. And finally, Sonia and Lyndah ride out in Sonia's car.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: From The Balcony
programme.desc: The dating game has Danni at a disadvantage when her feelings get the best of her. Andi tries to be strong for Gary. Karen stands strong on her principles. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Yellow Dress
programme.desc: Gary and Jasmine confront each other and the gloves come off. Andi struggles to maintain her career. Karen is confronted by a new enemy. Sabrina grows frustrated. (S1, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Home For A Queen
programme.desc: The ladies are concerned about Andi and her relationship choice. Sabrina stands strong for all of her friends who seem to be under attack. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: A Bad Feeling
programme.desc: The ladies are worried about Andi and her relationship. Karen tries to figure out what she wants. Sabrina tends to Calvin in his time of need. Danni tries to move on from her hurt feelings. (S1, ep24)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Long Road
programme.desc: Andi's world is turned upside down when hidden revelations rise to the surface. Karen is in a fight for her life. Sabrina aims to protect the ones she loves. (S1, ep25)

programme.title: The Game: A Very Special Episode
programme.desc: When Malik turns down the advances of the wife of the Sabers' owner, she becomes upset and returns with a vengeance, unwilling to take "no" for an answer.

programme.title: The Game: Whip It...Whip It Good
programme.desc: Jason decides to leave a wild Brittany with the ultimate babysitter... Tasha.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Man of the House
programme.desc: PRS is called to help a grandmother and her frightened grandson when renovations on her 19th century house stir up the pipe-smoking specter of a former tenant named Alfred.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Return of the Dead: Glove II
programme.desc: PRS returns to the site of one of their most famous cases, Daisytown, PA, where they had discovered a glove print of an old miner that they determined was the spirit of a Great-Grandfather.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bishton Hall P2
programme.desc: Karl ventures down into the cellars of this large country house and soon comes under attack from an unseen force.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Royal Court Theatre - Bacup
programme.desc: The world famous ghost hunting team return for a new series and start in a small theatre with a big problem…ghosts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Delapre Abbey
programme.desc: The team are joined by five members of the English rugby team as they investigate an all but forgotten piece of British history.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: p 8: Drakelow Tunnels - Kidderminster: With over 4 miles of haunted tunnels the team have one night to investigate this labyrinth of horror.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The National Emergency Services Gallery
programme.desc: A terrifying place full of history and paranormal activity. The team are tested as the try to find the spirits that refuse to leave this famous location.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Galleries of Justice
programme.desc: The legendary ghost hunters continue in Nottingham and a place where people could be jailed, sentenced and executed without even leaving the building.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Whose Trash Is It Anyway?
programme.desc: Mark's friend is running for public office, and he's a very honest man. But things get out of hand when an opponent tries to win by going after his son.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Hello and Farewell - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan helps Commander Michaels to deal with flashbacks of Vietnam; he also tries to convince her to go to therapy. Mark deals with his fear of flying.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Silent Bell
programme.desc: A pastor must follow a church council's decision to fire most of the staff at the school because they're not Christian.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Reunion
programme.desc: Mark attends his high school class reunion and learns that some memories are bittersweet for his old friends.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Source
programme.desc: A teenage girl tells school reporters that a driver came on to her right before the bus got into an accident. She may not be telling the truth. Jonathan tries to teach the news writers the correct way to report a story.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny is throwing himself into his work after the death of his father, and has applied for the role of State Vet. However, Danny's attempts to involve Thabo in the first phase of the Lion Breeding Project lead to Du Plessis feeling like an outsider.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: It is Danny's first day as State Vet and when he helps rescue some smuggled animals he feels he's making a difference. However, he discovers the role isn't going to be all plain sailing.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny's first big project as State Vet is a major animal translocation, and he is desperate to impress. Meanwhile, whilst Alice is out in the bush treating an injured zebra, she is stalked by lions. She makes it back to her jeep in time but is shaken up.

programme.title: South Park: My Future Self n' Me
programme.desc: My Future Self 'n' Me: After meeting his failed self from the future, Stan decides to avoid drink and drugs - but why does Butters also have a good-for-nothing future self staying with him? (S6, E16)

programme.title: South Park: Red Sleigh Down
programme.desc: Red Sleigh Down: Cartman's 'naughty or nice' accountant informs him that he has been too bad to earn his Christmas gift. All aboard Mr Hankey's Poo-Choo train for a trip to the North Pole! (S6, E17)

programme.title: South Park: Freak Strike
programme.desc: Freak Strike: The boys decide to create a freak in order to win a prize on a TV show - will Butters' case of &quot;Chinballalitis&quot; be enough to win? And will he be discovered by the freaks union? (S6, E03)

programme.title: South Park: Asspen
programme.desc: Asspen: When the boys go on a ski vacation, it's '80s-teen-movie central as Stan is challenged to a ski race by a professional skier named Tad. Only a &quot;montage&quot; can help Stan now! (S6, E02)

programme.title: South Park: The New Terrance and Phillip Move Trailer
programme.desc: The Terrance and Phillip Movie Trailer: The gang are desperate to see the Terrance and Phillip trailer (featuring during 'The Russell Crowe Show') but events conspire against them. (S6, E05)

programme.title: South Park: Fun with Veal
programme.desc: Fun With Veal: When the boys discover that veal is made from baby cows they are horrified. Time for a &quot;terrorist&quot; mission to rescue the poor little blighters from their deathly fate! (S6, E04)

programme.title: South Park: Krazy Kripples
programme.desc: Krazy K******s: Christopher Reeve arrives in town and Jimmy and Timmy aren't happy with the attention he gets. They form a club called &quot;The Crips&quot; - unaware of the gang that shares the name! (S7, E02)

programme.title: South Park: Toilet Paper
programme.desc: Toilet Paper: Mrs. Dreibel gives the boys detention for making a phallus out of clay in art class. Angry, they take revenge by toilet papering her house. Officer Barbrady is on their trail. (S7, E03)

programme.title: South Park: Fat Butt and Pancake Head
programme.desc: Fat Butt and Pancake Head: When Cartman wins a diversity event with his offensive hand puppet impersonation of Jennifer Lopez, Kyle is enraged. Soon the real J-Lo turns up, mightily peeved! (S7, E05)

programme.title: South Park: Lil' Crime Stoppers
programme.desc: Lil' Crime Stoppers: Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny decide to play detective; they go around the town solving minor &quot;crimes&quot; for a dollar. It's not long before they're busting meth labs! (S7, E06)

programme.title: MechMania

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: It is the last chance for teams to secure a spot before the final as they clash in one-on-one matches for a place in the top 16. New robots join the fray, hoping for a last-minute victory to advance to the championship.

programme.title: MechMania
programme.desc: The most battle-hardened combat robots in the UK compete in the MechMania Grand Final. After three heats, the tournament switches to a one-on-one sudden-death format until one team emerges as the victor.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Christa and Sumit

programme.desc: Relive the best moments from Simon Adams with his top highlights and unforgettable darts action!

programme.title: Red Dragon MODUS Super Series Darts Showdown III
programme.desc: Check out the best pairs moments from the Influencer Darts Showdown III, featuring Angry Ginge & Jayden Walker.

programme.title: Darts
programme.desc: Full session replay of International Pairs Week: Finals Night.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Emotions run high for Megan as Dylan goes AWOL. Sassi gets some big news. Amber throws an engagement party to remember. And it's super-sad times for Chloe as Jordan gets a diagnosis. (S5, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Shannon has some exciting news but Charlie isn't happy. Sassi sits Darren down and demands answers. Amber and Ste are at breaking point and Megan tries to talk some sense into Dylan. (S5, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Charlie struggles to accept Shannon's pregnancy, while Megan can't step away from Dylan. Ste stays over at Amber's and Chloe and Jordan make a tearful breakthrough. (S5, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Amber has a proposal for Ste. Chloe dreams of a big house while single Sassi is missing Darren. Shannon and Charlie are left speechless at their gender reveal party. (S6, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Surprise for Chloe as Jordan tells her he isn't sure he wants to be with her. Megan organises a party and learns you can't please everyone. Amber feels overwhelmed. Sassi feels the love. (S6, ep2)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Citizen Jane
programme.desc: When Gertrude McCabe was murdered, her niece Jane Alexander was named her principal beneficiary. Jane, a widow in her 70s, began to suspect that her live-in boyfriend, Tom O'Donnell, might have been involved in the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours: My Father's Killer
programme.desc: James Bernard Campbell entered SueZann Bosler's home, murdered her father and almost killed her. 48 HOURS follows SueZann as she returns to the crime scene and then focuses on her unusual crusade for justice.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Taken: The Amber Dubois Story
programme.desc: A report on the February 2009 disappearance of Amber Dubois, just blocks from Escondido High School in California. 48 HOURS examines the permanent impact her disappearance has had on her family, even after the discovery and conviction of the murderer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: AKA Rockefeller
programme.desc: Authorities suspect a con man who has used many different identities may be a murderer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Jeffrey MacDonald: Fight for Truth
programme.desc: A report on the 1970 murders of U.S. Army Doctor Jeffrey MacDonald’s pregnant wife and two daughters at their Fort Bragg home. Having served 25 years in prison for the murders, MacDonald still proclaims his innocence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Accused
programme.desc: In 1996 the car which Sheila Bryan was driving with her mother as passenger accidentally veered off the road and into a ditch killing her mother. Sheila was charged with murder -- then tried, convicted, and sentenced to life imprisonment.

programme.title: Wes Craven's Mind Ripper
programme.desc: A top secret experiment intended to produce a superhuman has gone terribly wrong. Now the creators, trapped in a remote desert outpost, are being pursued ruthlessly by their creation.

programme.title: Children of the Corn
programme.desc: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed. Starring: Peter Horton, Linda Hamilton, R.G. Armstrong, John Franklin, Courtney Gains

programme.title: Andy Warhol Presents: Blood for Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula (Udo Kier) knows that should he fail to drink the required amount of a pure virgin's blood, his living dead will be over. But the Count discovers not all of his female victims are as pure as they say they are.

programme.title: Rats: Night of Terror
programme.desc: Rats: Night of Terror is a post-apocalyptic pot-boiler sees some of the last humans alive grapple with a horde of flesh-eating rodents - and a shocking final revelation that has fast become director Bruno Mattei's signature 'twist'.

programme.title: Psycho Cop
programme.desc: Six college students on their weekend vacation are humiliated and killed one by one by a psycho cop.

programme.title: Saturday The 14th
programme.desc: A family moves into a house inhabited by scary creatures. A number of close calls ensue.

programme.title: Return of the Swamp Thing
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite muck-encrusted plant-man is back in this tongue-in-cheek action-adventure which was the sequel to the original cult classic Swamp Thing and based on the award-winning D.C. Comics series. Starring: Heather Locklear, Louis Jourdan

programme.title: Extracurricular: Extracurricular
programme.desc: An entertaining blast of mean-spirited genre thrills, starring Luke Goss (Bros fame). Four high school seniors make a pact to execute a series of perfect, elaborate murders and get some thrills behind them before going to college.

programme.title: Terror Train
programme.desc: Three years after a prank that went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train. Starring: Ben Johnson, Jamie Lee Curtis, Hart Bochner, David Copperfield

programme.title: LA Slasher
programme.desc: An anti-conspiracy video blogger thinks she is slipping into an alternate reality after being approached by an old man claiming to have worked for the legendary Majestic-12 (aka majic), created after the UFO incident at Roswell, New Mexico in 1947.

programme.title: Odd Thomas
programme.desc: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces. Starring: Anton Yelchin, Ashley Sommers, Leonor Varela, Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Shark Attack 3 Megalodon
programme.desc: Shark Attack 3: Megalodon is a “jaws”-dropping action thriller from the director of Kickboxer starring John Barrowman and Jenny McShane. When two researchers discover a colossal shark's tooth off the Mexican coast their worst fears surface.

programme.title: Bigfoot Wars
programme.desc: A small town becomes the focal point of a brutal clash between man and a legendary beast.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E9 - Out Of Their Minds
programme.desc: An alien ship fires a weapon at Moya. The blast makes it through and causes everyone's consciousness to jump into another body.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E10 - My Three Crichtons
programme.desc: A strange globe appears on Moya, sucking in Crichton and duplicating him creating two additional people.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E11 - Look At The Princess, Part 1: A Kiss Is But A Kiss
programme.desc: On a planet about to crown its new monarch. The problem is the Princess cannot ascend unless she finds a genetically compatible mate.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E12 - Look At The Princess, Part 2: I Do, I Think
programme.desc: The Queen offers Crichton a choice; marry her daughter the crown princess, or she'll turn him over to Scorpius.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E13 - Look At The Princess, Part 3: The Maltese Crichton
programme.desc: John Crichton faces eighty years as a statue. That is, until the Scarran Cargn decapitates the statue and drops the head into a vat of acid.
